channel.name: TVNZ 2 NZ
channel.title: Kitchen Nightmares
channel.desc: Gordon helps a Puerto Rican restaurant in Yonkers, New York, which struggled when Covid hit. Appliances break, there are staff problems, uncooked chicken is served. Can Gordon turn things around.

channel.name: TVNZ 2 NZ
channel.title: Gordon, Gino And Fred's Road Trip
channel.desc: Join Gordon Ramsay, Gino D'Acampo and Fred Sirieix as they take a road trip through Europe. Tonight, the trio head to Scotland as Gordon prepares to cook a feast for the chief of Clan Ramsay.
